website_summaries.verdict: These clear edge guards blend with any surface color and wrap around corners as well for all-in-one coverage. Versatile and convenient.
pros: Can be used on virtually any edge, curve, or corner
Soft and protective, but reinforced with an anti-tear layer for added durability and bite resistance
Non-toxic, food grade silicone construction is safe for babies and pets
Easy to apply and adheres well to smooth surfaces
cons: Requires a soak in boiling water before application

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my baby safe!
customer_reviews.text: My son is now 11 months old and is beginning to explore the world around him, when he got a bump on his head we needed to make the house "Baby Proof." These edge protectors are great because you get a lot of length in one roll, its super thick and easy to apply to edges and corners. I would recommend this to any parent wanting to keep their child safe.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive look and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My baby is at the stage where he loves to stand on his wobbly feet and walk and hold everything he can reach. I bought this for my mom’s house since she have many desk with sharp corners. I am not sure if it’s because most of her tables are squares or rectangle shape because the product goes very well onto the sides and corners of her desk. I’m quite impressed by its look (maybe because it’s clear). I was Very lazy so I purchased it for awhile and just had the chance to install them but for now the adhesion seems very good. Will update after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Y.

customer_reviews.title: LOOK ELSEWHERE! GREAT IDEA POOR EXECUTION.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea poor execution, -comes rolled up so you have to try to straighten it. -adhesive comes in a separate roll so you have to apply to the guard and then to the object. -the adhesive doesnt adher - when and if the adhesive works it pulls off paint. - adds some protection when it stays on but seems a little thin. There are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fell off after a few days
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was great because you can’t really see it. So, the look of your room isn’t affected. But, it started falling off within a couple days. I had cleaned the surface prior to installing, and our house is climate controlled so it’s not like the glue melted. The corner of the bumper started to flatten out and just popped off, leaving the residue behind. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase out of desperation like I did...
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading several negative reviews, I went ahead and purchase out of desperation. Our little boy chews on the top of his crib; however, the design of his crib does not have slats so the tie-on chew guard style won't work for us. After wiping down his crib with rubbing alcohol, my husband installed the adhesive strips. As soon as we put our little boy in his bed he pulled those strips hallway off! Don't waste your money. Now we have globs of adhesive stuck to his crib...
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Halphen

customer_reviews.title: Falls off easily, difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this is a great idea. Clear, inconspicuous, sounds great. However, it started falling off after 1 day, and my child thinks it's a plastic teething toy now. It also is tedious to apply-- it took a solid 45 minutes to do the coffee table. Don't waste your time/money/energy on this one.
customer_reviews.author: ltny

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use..you just cut it to the length needed. Adhesion is awful. I even used rubbing alcohol to ensure it would be sticking to a perfectly clear surface. The adhesive is lifting & the plastic stripping is lifting as well. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: stevie w

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to put on but the plastic part slowly came off the adhesive part. So when I tried to remove the adhesive off completely (because the plastic part had already fallen off) it tore the paint off of my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: These do not stay sticky for long. They stayed put for a few weeks and then they start to peal up which is then an easy target for a toddler to yank right off! I have replaced them twice on the table I bought them for and have now run out of the sticky tape. The tape is very time consuming to remove, but it does all come off without sticky residue left behind. The strips have fallen off for a second time and I give up...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stick.
customer_reviews.text: It was semi easy to stick on... was hard to make not look “wavy” on the corner of my island legs. So I wasn’t totally happy with how sloppy it looked. And 3 days later it was hanging off. I applied it perfectly, cleaned my surface etc. VERY disappointed. Returning - don’t waste your time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carly G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two weeks ago, I use it when I received it. It doing great, great quality and didn’t fall off like other people mention. I am suggesting that you should use it slight and too tie, don’t force it. It will stay correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana99

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory
customer_reviews.text: In theory this was a great idea, but execution was far off. The adhesive is hard to lay flat so when you install, there are visible bubbles everywhere and it looks awful. For us, the location was t a big deal so we left it. If you pull the plastic too tight, it eventually just falls right off. We usually have to push it back on at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It worked while it was attached, but it comes unattached.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bumper guard, but it comes unattached from the 2 sided tape. We went away for the weekend and half the guard was hanging off unattached when we returned. I pressed it back onto the tape. Will see if it stays attached.
customer_reviews.author: Vmo

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: We had an incident where a child tripped and hit her head on her upper eye on the edge of the round table and cut opened, had to get stitches, soo we immediately purchased this for the safety of our children and to prevent any future incidents like this! very unnoticeable on the table its like its not even there, firm and sturdy so kids wont pick on it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Giggles-and-Learning

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product wish that the adhesive was stronger every other day have to pitch and press them down again. Used it on glass coffee table to protect daughter from hitting her head. Still a great item to have.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Can feel table edge when barely pushing on jel
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion works great and everything and it's really easy to install. However, I personally do not think that the jel is thick enough to really help much. I can push into it without much effort and still feel the sharp edge of the table, round and circle tables. It also doesn't come with corner pieces and the jel doesn't come together in a way to easily fasion corner gaurds yourself. You can do it, just not without some effort. So, in my opinion, using this on anything but a round surface is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Danyeil

customer_reviews.title: Not great for corners
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive isn’t already connected to the guard so you have to apply it to both the furniture and guard, which adds an unnecessary steps. It also started coming off a few days after installing.
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: Came off within an hour
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find a table bumper safe for my little guy to put his mouth on. Within an hour all the tubing started curling off. There is no real way to cover corners with this tubing and that was a royal pain. The adhesive is so sticky so I don’t understand why it doesn’t stay. Overnight half of the bumpers had pulled off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: good services
customer_reviews.text: after I contacted the seller for the problem i had with the product, they mailed me a replacement along with instructions. I reapplied the bumper strip and it worked well so far. I like their services.
customer_reviews.author: selina chen

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product and was so disappointed :( it doesn’t stick and comes off within MINUTES. I have a wood table that I wanted to protect my busy toddler from.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install but the adhesive falls off. We bought this to use around our fireplace has marble and the adhesive keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Adartse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Totally this product is easy to use and adhension, but I think the glue can be better, when taping, sometimes it is easy to break. But totally is recommended!
customer_reviews.author: aboluo

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: Title says "Corner Guards," but the material is hard and won't stay stuck at corners unless it's cut into various pieces. It is ok on edges, but it isn't soft as claimed. The only good thing about this is its transparency
customer_reviews.author: Crbrus

customer_reviews.title: Invisible on the wall
customer_reviews.text: My 1year old is walking around home. I am worried about he will bump his head. I bought this product to cover every wall corner and table edge. It comes with the tape. Almost invisible after I put it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Hanxiao L.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it because they are transparent and you can't even notice it is there. Very easy to set up and I love how easily I was able to cut it to fit any length.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Clear bumper
customer_reviews.text: This product barely stayed on a day, offering no protection for out 10 month old. The few parts that stuck actually ripped the varnish off our TV stand. Company was very diligent in trying to correct the problem. Their customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Marzullo

customer_reviews.title: I feel very good about this product after I use it.
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient to use. You just need to stick double-sided adhesive tape and anti-collision stickers on the furniture And it is transparent almost, do not affect the beauty of furniture completely.The bottom line is that kids don't break it easily compared to foam.Anyway,I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bard  Tang

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Soft enough that when my daughter hits a hard edge she doesn't even notice. We have put it around our bookcases, corners of tables, and even on walls. The products hasn't fallen off or disintegrated when my daughter has tried to use it as a teether. Thank you for making me feel like my home is a completely safe environment for my child to explore, learn and grow!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: It was ok if you don't want something super bulky and obviously seen. It had to be boiled first.
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as I hoped and didn't realize I was going to have to boil it first before using it, liked the fact that it's clear and not very noticeable, I put it on my wall corners and it took the paint off (probably was not very good paint) I ended up getting something different that had more cushioning to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crook

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It is not the best. Less than a month, it detaches from the furniture and toom the paints off. Also it leaves huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Tried putting these on my glass table edges and woke up the next morning with them half way peeled off. Needless to say, It wasn't the solution I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Very worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is really good quality than other same product, it is easy to install and keep the furniture color.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and you need 2 people
customer_reviews.text: My son is teething and we figured this would be great to put on the railings.... WRONG! It is hard to put this on smoothly without it bubbling. My son pulled it right off!
customer_reviews.author: TTPIGGY

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great used it for many things for baby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea and look of these. Easy to install. After two days they were coming off of the adhesive though. I keep pushing them back in place but they do not stick therefore, not doing the job they are intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn T.

customer_reviews.title: Thin but decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. They aren’t thick as you can see in the photo. But they will do.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy!Very good protection product! I actually bought it for my mom because she needed to Baby proof her house with all of her grandkids and there was always such a problem with kids getting hit because of the sharp corners on furniture. This was such a home it's stayed on as needed and now kids aren't getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: YorkEltonuNu

customer_reviews.title: Peels off after one day!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice idea but it peeled off immediately after 1 day :(
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof1

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, Good price!
customer_reviews.text: The price of 4 clear corner protectors at target is $5. With this product, you can apply every corner of your house. The material looks nice and there is no strange smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: They did not last even 24 hrs. The corners started coming off, and within hours they all came off.
customer_reviews.author: Lana M

customer_reviews.title: peeled off after 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: peeled off after 2 hours I tried to stick it again, but it was still peeling off
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not adhere, started pealing off about an hour after sticking.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Worksgreat!
customer_reviews.text: These corner protectors are wonderful for a household with bumbling toddlers! My kiddo kept running into the corner of our granite table so I bought these protectors. They actually look nice on the table and they stay in place with the adhesive stickers it comes with. This was a great purchase, I highly recommend it!Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Peels off easily
customer_reviews.text: I give It two because It peels off very easily and the only thing good about is that It’s made of a very good material
customer_reviews.author: Aboalwuees

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Stick
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my wooden table in the living room but did not stick and kept falling off
customer_reviews.author: mel b.

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive tape doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: Less than 24 hours after applying, the adhesive tape failed to hold the corner pieces. The molding itself is pretty easy to use and works like I'd hoped; it's just the tape that doesn't work. I'm going to buy some brand name double sided tape to re-attach these pieces (and then buy some other product for the next time).
customer_reviews.author: RDG

customer_reviews.title: Usable
customer_reviews.text: They are usable but since the table I used it on has some curves, they keep falling. I think they will work fine on a straight edge.
customer_reviews.author: yessenia

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! So glad I found it. Even has a lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. Too thin and not wide enough, the adhesion is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and it just didn’t work out. I used this on a small cube shelf for my little one and it just did not stick well. For us it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion sucks. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The instructions said to boil them before so I did. It ended up partially melting to the pot so one of the edges is now wrinkled. The adhesion sucks and so it has repeatedly fallen off. Sucks. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Genthner

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Glue wouldn’t stay attached. My grandson who is 1 1/2 was able to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Muffler

customer_reviews.title: PVC not Silicone!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read through the description, because would have seen that this is not safe silicone at all, but toxic PVC. PVC is highly toxic, especially for babies and children! Going straight in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: DKing

customer_reviews.title: Not for all furtniture
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as it's described.. It's not for all furniture.. I used on computer chair as a guard to avoid scratches to the call but the silicone is lifting on the corners.. Lasted 1 day and constant lifting had to change twice.
customer_reviews.author: NYSJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than it seemed
customer_reviews.text: Liked from the looks but did not work. My toddler peeled it off like a sticker so easily; was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Worse product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I will never ordering again. I will attach some picture
customer_reviews.author: Indira Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the next day
customer_reviews.text: Followed all the instructions. Cleaned the surface. But the next day, it started to fall off. The adhesive tape stuck well to the wooden surface, but the rubber bumper just didn’t keep stick to the adhesive tape
customer_reviews.author: Anita Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT! It has taken the varnish right off my 3 year old wood tables! The plastic does not stick to the tape but the tape is next to impossible to remove from the table! I am beyond upset that this has messed my furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mascino

customer_reviews.title: Not your best bet
customer_reviews.text: It does no stay on. My husband and I spent a lot of time putting it on just to wake up the next morning to it on the floor. Adhesive tape does not stick well to the plastic it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Salin Petrossian

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to install, should be way easier. Apart from that is not a bad product, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Pérez Cabanas

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to apply and doesn’t stick! Rolled up and came off in less than 12 hours. Also difficult to use when initially adhering to the surface...the sticky tape stretches and pulls apart. Awful product!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection. Soft and Transparent.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and transparent. It comes as the picture showed. A good corner and edge bumper protects my son very well. I don't need to worry about him getting hurt any more.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft edges for safety. Very easy to install though they can fall off after a while so need stronger adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s really poor Quality , it came out often 30 minutes I installed
customer_reviews.author: Samira Ahmadpour

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fulfill the purpose of protection from sharp corners.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer_1985

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This works really well! For the price, I think it was worth it. A good purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: starsBuy now!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put around our coffee table to protect my grandson in case he fell against it. The product arrived quickly & was super easy to attach. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Very transparent!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our TV stand, and it works great. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prevent the baby
customer_reviews.text: It's very practical to prevent the baby from bumping into the table and buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Not attached properly!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't attached properly to the table. I had to remove it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ITEM
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is very soft. I feel it will be safe for my boys
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesion
customer_reviews.text: These fell off within 24 hours of adhering them to our glass table. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Holtze

customer_reviews.title: total failure
customer_reviews.text: it rarely functions as a cushion nor stick to edges neither
customer_reviews.author: J-June

customer_reviews.title: Paint Peeler
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive tape definitely peels off the paint it’s going on top of.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very poor one, not only will it stick, it will shorten
customer_reviews.author: binghua huang

product_meta.title: Zalock Transparent Corner Guards, Furniture Edge Protectors Soft Silicone Bumper Strip Baby Proofing 20ft(6m) with Double-Sided Tape for Cabinets,Tables,Household Appliances,etc (Transparent)
